You are a necromancer with control over everything belonging in the afterlife.
power.reincarnation-origins.werewolf/hum: Killing enemies fuels your transformations. Kill 3-5 enemies to turn into Lithe Form, 6-8 to turn into pack form, and 9+ to shift into Brute Form
power.reincarnation-origins.werewolf/all: Your strength waxes and wanes with the phases of the moon. You are most powerful during a full moon, and least powerful during a new moon.
power.reincarnation-origins.werewolf/bru: You are more powerful in this form, you naturally have increased strength and hardiness. You're also larger.
You do more damage and cause bleeding with your claws (unarmed attacks).
Killing enemies fuels your rage, keeping you in brute form for longer.
Channel your bloodlust into strength and resistance!
